hackathon-eligibility: Any undergraduate or graduate college student is allowed to paricipate. You don't have to be an NJIT student. However, you must be at least 18 years old. Sadly, high school students are not allowed to participate.
hackathon-rules: While at HackNJIT, you will be expected to abide by the MLH Code of Conduct (http://static.mlh.io/docs/mlh-code-of-conduct.pdf).

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $1500, MLH Medal per person, Dell Venue 10 Tablet per person
$500 to the top hacker using the Addteq API

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=150 Bleeker St, Newark, NJ 07103, USA
hackathon-description-header: Create interesting and innovative applications that improve life in one way or another
hackathon-location-description: New Jersey Institute of Technology Campus Center
